EmailTemplate.name: Serpentine Gallery Pavilion 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: INVITATION: Join AECOM at the Serpentine Gallery Pavilion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Serpentine Pavilion 2015: Private view
Join us on Thursday 23 July to celebrate the 15th - and our third - Serpentine Pavilion in the beautiful setting of Kensington Gardens.
Experience bold new architecture that plays with structure, light and form. You could be in for a surprising evening, and at the very least drinks and canap√©s.
Architecture by SelgasCano Engineering and technical design, cost management and project management by AECOM
More information about this year's Serpentine Pavilion http://www.aecom.com/News/Innovation/Serpentine+Pavilion+2015
On: Thursday 23 July 2015, 6.30pm - 9.30pm
At: Serpentine Gallery Kensingston Gardens London W2 3XA
RSVP by email to RSVPserpentine.europe@aecom.com before Friday 10 July, or telephone 020 3170 2782.
By invitation only and non-transferable.
